story_final_02_09000/2401_1201_0500_10: Good teamwork. But how long can you last?
story_final_02_09000/2401_1201_0700_10:
(But there must be something we can do! There
has to be a way!)
story_final_02_09000/2401_1201_0800_10:
You can’t become “evil,” but you can’t become
“justice” either...
story_final_02_09000/2401_1201_1000_10:
Paulo... Are you believing in the bonds and
connections of justice again?
story_final_02_09000/2401_1201_1100_10: If so, you’re right back where you started.
story_final_02_09000/2401_1201_1200_10:
What have you gained by believing in childish
fantasies?
story_final_02_09000/2401_1201_1300_10: Are you really any closer to your ideals?
story_final_02_09000/2401_1201_1400_10:
You won’t find the power you seek in the bonds
of justice!
story_final_02_09000/2401_1201_1600_10:
I was forcing myself to believe in the power of
connections, using only logic.
story_final_02_09000/2401_1201_1800_10:
By making mistakes and accepting my own
weakness, I finally realized...
story_final_02_09000/2401_1201_1900_10:
Everyone kept trying to reach out to me, no matter
what was happening...
story_final_02_09000/2401_1201_2000_10:
I believe in that warmth and in the strength of
those connections!
story_final_02_09000/2401_1201_2100_10:
Tina, [Name:PlayerNickname ], Blue, Cheren,
Looker, Professor Oak...
story_final_02_09000/2401_1201_2200_10:
Colress... Hoopa... Rockruff... And lots of
others, too!
story_final_02_09000/2401_1201_2400_10:
I didn’t notice before that I was connected through
the kindness of all of my friends!
story_final_02_09000/2401_1201_2500_10: But now I can see the bonds we have!
story_final_02_09000/2401_1201_2600_10:
No matter what difficulties we face, we help each
other out! We lend each other so much strength!
story_final_02_09000/2401_1201_2700_10:
That’s why I won’t be indecisive anymore! And I
won’t lose sight of my path!
story_final_02_09000/2401_1201_2800_10: This is my path to follow!
story_final_02_09000/2401_1201_3200_10:
show me what you can do with that so-called
strength of yours!
story_final_02_09000/2401_1201_3700_10: I’ve learned a lot, you know! Even from you!
story_final_02_09000/2401_1201_3800_10:
I’ll put you back in your place! Mewtwo!
Mega Evolve!
story_final_02_09000/2401_1201_4700_10:
Let’s see what this weird device that Colress made
can do! Take this!
story_final_02_09000/2401_1201_4900_10: I’m so glad! Come on over, buddy!
story_final_02_09000/2401_1201_5000_10: Tina! Quick, take Hoopa and get out of here!
story_final_02_09000/2401_1201_5300_10: This battle is over. You’ve won.
